title: Language Leadership Enhancement Program Through Online Group Collaboration

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Strengthening practical language leadership competencies through project-based assessment in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively develop practical language teaching strategies with peer leaders using online collaboration tools (e.g., Padlet, Slack) within 8 weeks.
Learners can maintain member interaction rates above 70% and generate meaningful discourse in 5 group discussions following the social interdependence learning model.
Learners can collaborate with team members to design and present a workplace-applicable language education collaboration model in a final project and pass the evaluation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
